processor.name: AccountCreditPlugin
processor.description:
Used to meter account credit. Does following before WriteProductView: 1. Looks if status field is correct (should be either "APPROVED" or "DENIED") 2. If this credit is based on a previous request (RequestID > 0), update a record in AccountCreditRequest product view to have a correct status and credit amount 3. Return
NOTE: RequestID property should be metered as -1 if this credit is not based on a previous request (see AccountCreditRequest).
